title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Greece 2024
yAxis: GDP growth rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The line rapidly increased by 694.74% from Year 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 1.51 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 0.19 was reported at Year 2016
min_summary: Overall GDP growth rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
mid_summary: In general GDP growth rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 1.51 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 0.19 was reported at Year 2016
max_summary: Overall GDP growth rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 1.51 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 0.19 was reported at Year 2016
The line drastically increased by 7.9 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
